# Shahir Ahmed - Full Stack Developer & Software Engineer

## Quick Summary
Shahir Ahmed is a Full Stack Developer and Software Engineer based in the United States. He specializes in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Vue.js, Node.js, and cloud platforms like AWS and Firebase.

## Professional Experience

### Software Engineer at Sarva (Current)
- Architecting a full-stack vendor management and grocery marketplace platform
- Building AI-powered features with RAG over Firestore and Algolia
- Implementing Stripe Connect payment processing with identity verification
- Developing real-time order tracking with Google Maps integration
- Tech stack: Next.js, Firebase, Vercel, Stripe, Google Maps API

### Open Source Contributions
- **Mermaid.js**: Top 25 contributor out of 600+ contributors
  - Implemented text wrapping algorithms
  - Added auto-scaling data labels
  - Created customizable styling features
  - Library serves 1.2M+ weekly downloads
  
- **FarmData2**: Ranked #2 overall contributor
  - 25+ pull requests merged
  - 14,000+ lines of code contributed
  - Built full-stack crop tracking system
  - Integrated 18+ farmOS API endpoints

## Education
- **Dickinson College** - Computer Science & Mathematics Graduate (May 2025)

## Technical Skills

### Programming Languages
JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Java, C, SQL, Lua, R, MATLAB

### Frontend
React, Vue.js, Next.js, HTML5, CSS3, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, Electron

### Backend
Node.js, Express.js, Firebase, Flask, Socket.IO, RESTful APIs, WebRTC

### Databases
PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Firestore, SQLite, MySQL

### Cloud & DevOps
AWS (S3, Lambda, EC2), Firebase, Google Cloud, Vercel, Netlify, Docker, Git

## Featured Projects

### Sarva Bazaar
Full-stack vendor management platform and grocery marketplace for South Asian supply chains.
- URL: https://www.sarvabazaar.com/
- Features: AI assistants, Stripe payments, real-time order tracking, voice input

### Queue Up
Music-based social platform that matches users using weighted Spotify similarity with real-time chat and notifications.
- URL: https://queue-up.onrender.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/Shahir-47/Queue-Up
- Features: Weighted Spotify similarity, WebSockets chat/notifications, JWT auth, S3 presigned uploads

### CoSign
Task management with external verification and automated penalty emails for missed deadlines.
- URL: https://cosign-nwwl.onrender.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/Shahir-47/CoSign
- Features: Verification workflow, recurring tasks (RRULE), AES encryption at rest, WebSockets, S3 presigned uploads

### Albatross
AI-powered safe navigation app built at HackHarvard 2024.
- URL: https://albatross-hack.netlify.app/
- Features: Safety-based routing, crime zone analysis, real-time rerouting

### SweetFriend
Diabetes management app with Dexcom integration, built at PennApps 2024.
- URL: https://sweet-friend.vercel.app/app/dashboard
- Features: Real-time glucose tracking, AI meal recognition, health insights
